bullets: We met randomly, bonded over memes, late-night talks, and food cravings. From bench partners to best bros, our journey is filled with laughter, unplanned adventures, and brotherhood that keeps us strong through anything life throws our way.
slide_3.title: Our Story

bullets: Late arrivals, bunking, and chaos always followed us everywhere.
slide_4.title: Problems

bullets: Make the craziest memories while standing by each other no matter what.
slide_5.title: Goals

bullets: From shouting across corridors to deep 2 AM talks, our friendship is chaos, comfort, and everything in between—defined by laughter, madness, and real brotherhood.
slide_6.title: Vibes

bullets: Our daily routine: roast, chill, repeat. Data says 90% of the time we're laughing. Remaining 10%? Planning more chaos. Every moment together adds to our crazy stats.
slide_7.title: Data Analysis

bullets: Life’s better with the Mans. It's not just friendship, it's a full-time commitment to laughter, loyalty, and limitless memories.
slide_9.title: Conclusion

bullets: Epic jokes, dumb plans, and inside jokes that nobody else gets.
slide_10.title: Highlights
